name: The Large Custom Bus Scroll.
description: Design your own Custom Bus Scroll! (20.5 x 60) Use your imagination to create a unique, personalized list of 11-13 destinations. Include your favorite places, cities, beloved authors - or anything you like. Be creative. A gentle aging technique is applied for a true vintage look. Artist canvas with UV safe ink. • Write your 11-13 destinations in the Notes to Seller section during checkout. • You will receive an emailed proof before your order is printed. DISPLAYING YOUR BUS SCROLL Use a poster hanger available here in my shop, or if you prefer to have your canvas stretched by your local framer select the additional 2-inch border when placing your order. This bus scroll is sent rolled in a kraft mailing tube. Allow 12-15 days to ship.

name: The Custom Wood Bus Scroll.
description:
Create your own transit scroll on natural birchwood (12 x 36). The same designs as my canvas bus scrolls, now available on birch plyboard. Like a tattoo on wood, the ink sinks into the grain for a modern rustic feel. I use an aging technique to create a vintage feel (see photo 4).

Make a personalized list of 11-13 destinations - your favorite cities, favorite places or anything you like – be creative!

• Write your 11 – 13 destinations in the notes box during checkout.

Your artwork will not smear and can be cleaned with a soft cloth. Easy to hang or lean on a mantel or shelf. About ½ inch thick.

12 x 36 Birch Board
Ready to hang
Ships in 12 – 14 days to U.S. and Canada ONLY.

name: The Small Christmas Bus Scroll.
description:
The Christmas bus scroll is one of my personal favorites. This small Arctic Express canvas is a jolly way to celebrate the holiday. The destinations are inspired by beloved Christmas TV or cinema classics!

Your holiday bus scroll is printed on quality canvas with UV ink. Magic elves apply a special aging technique for a vintage look.

12 x 36 include half-inch white border.
Use a standard size poster frame available in stores.

Your Christmas arrives rolled in a sturdy mailing tube.
Please allow 8-10 days to ship.

name: The Wedding Bus Scroll.
description: Celebrate a wedding or anniversary with this custom bus scroll personalized for the bride and groom. Makes the perfect gift or reception decoration. Quality canvas with a vintage aging technique. UV safe ink. (20.5 x 60) The Formula: Provide this list in the Notes to Seller box during check out. • The Street or City groom was born • The Street or City bride was born • The City of groom's College • The City of bride's College • Grooms' Favorite City • Brides Favorite City • Their first date (i.e. Yankee Stadium, Joe’s Café etc.) • Where he proposed (i.e. the location, city, street or place) • The Location of Ceremony (Street or Church name etc) • Their Honeymoon destination • The Street of their new or current home • Bride & Groom’s First Names • Wedding Date DISPLAYING YOUR CUSTOM WEDDING CANVAS This 20.5 x 60 Bus Scroll fits in the poster hanger available here in my shop. If you prefer to have your local framer stretch the canvas, please select the extra 2-inch border when placing your order. The Wedding Bus Scroll ships rolled in a sturdy tube. Allow 12-15 days to ship.

name: Paris Vintage Travel Poster.
description:
My original design celebrates Paris, the City of Lights (La ville des Lumières) and the iconic Eiffel Tower. You'll love the festive red flag fluttering on top!

20” x 30”. 
Frame is NOT included.
Heavy matte paper. 
Signed and dated.

Ships in 8-10 days.

name: University of Michigan Bus Scroll.
description:
Hail! To the victors valiant!  An homage to my alma mater, the University of Michigan Transit Sign makes a perfect gift in official school colors!

Choose from Collegiate or Traditional font options (see last photo).

You may choose to swap out a single destination with one of your favorite U of M locations – a hangout, fraternity or sorority etc. Just leave a note in the ‘notes to seller’ section during checkout.

HANGING YOUR UNIVERSITY BUS SCROLL
Choose a poster hanger available here in the Transit Design Shop or have your local framer stretch it for you. If you want to have your framer do it, select the 2-inch border option when ordering. 

The Unversity of Michigan Bus Scroll ships rolled in a sturdy package.
Please allow 8-10 days to ship.


MY COLLEGIATE COLLECTION INCLUDES:
University of Michigan
Michigan State University
University of Illinois
The University of Alabama
Auburn University
University of Mississippi – Ole Miss
Mississippi State

Don’t see your school? Just ask!

name: The Small Custom Bus Scroll.
description:
Create a personalized canvas Bus Scroll. (12 x 36)
Design your own destination list with 11-13 items. Include your favorite places or countries - or a wine and food list – it’s up to you. Your transit scroll includes a vintage aging technique for an authentic look. Quality canvas with UV ink. 

• Write your 11-13 destinations in the Notes section during checkout.
• You will receive an emailed proof before your order is printed.

CHOOSE ROLLED OR STRETCHED CANVAS:
• Select a rolled canvas if you want to frame it yourself. The 12 x 36 bus scroll fits into a standard poster frame available in stores or on-line.
 • Choose a stretched canvas if you’d like a ready to hang piece, gallery wrapped canvas stretched over a wood frame with white edges. About .75 inches deep.


This item ships rolled. 
Allow 12-15 days processing.

name: The Paris Metro Scroll.
description: Paris comes to life with this vintage subway metro scroll inspired by an actual French transit line. All Transit Design bus scrolls are printed on quality artist canvas with UV rated ink. (20.5 x 60) HANGING YOUR SUBWAY METRO SCROLL Choose a poster hanger available here in the Transit Design Shop or have your local framer stretch it for you. If you want to have your framer do it, select the 2-inch border option when ordering. The Paris Metro Scroll ships rolled in a sturdy mailing tube. Please allow 8-10 days to ship.

name: Any 12 x 36 Bus Scroll on Wood.
description:
Choose from any 12 x 36 Standard Bus Scrolls – the same as my canvas transit signs, printed on birch plyboard. I apply a rustic aging technique for a vintage feel (see photo details). 

Like a tattoo on wood, the ink is absorbed into the board revealing the natural grain. Will not smudge and can be wiped with a cloth. Use slots on backside for easy hanging or lean on a mantle or shelf.

12 x 36 Birch Plyboard
Ready to hang
Excludes custom designs

Indicate which design you prefer during checkout:

Small London
Small Nashville 
Small Paris Metro 
Small New York City
Small Europe
Small Italy
Small Michigan
Holiday - Christmas

Allow 8-10 days to ship. U.S. and Canada ONLY.

name: The Christmas Bus Scroll.
description:
This festive bus scroll conjures holiday magic with destinations inspired by Christmas TV and movie classics! Can you guess which ones? My scrolls are printed on artist’s canvas with UV-rated ink. (20.5 x 60)

Want to create your own subway sign? Click on the Custom section of my shop.

name: The Midwinter Bus Scroll.
description:
From a gorgeous Christmas carol penned by English poet Christina Rossetti before 1872 and set to music in 1906.

Midnight blue with weathered cream letters and a beautiful weathered finish.

Your holiday bus scroll is printed on quality canvas with UV ink. A subtle aging technique is applied for a vintage look.

12 x 36 includes half-inch white border.
Use a standard size poster frame available in stores.

Arrives rolled in a sturdy mailing tube.
Please allow 8-10 days to ship.

name: The Michigan Bus Scroll.
description: Inspired by my hometown, this bus scroll features popular resort towns of Northern Michigan. Evocative of woodsy cabins and bonfires by the lake. 100% Quality Canvas. UV ink. name: The Gallery Wrapped Scroll.
description:
This Gallery Wrapped Bus Scroll comes already stretched on a frame.  Create your own list of 7 destinations. Choose your favorite towns, streets, wines, or authors – be creative! Ready to hang. (24 x 36) 

• List 7 destinations in the Notes to Seller box during checkout.
• You will receive an emailed proof before your order is printed.

Printed on artist canvas with UV safe ink. 
This canvas is stretched on a 1.5” deep frame with black edges and ready to hang. It would also look great leaning on a mantel or ledge.

IMPORTANT SHIPPING INFORMATION
Ships to the US and CANADA only. 
Your canvas will be shipped in a large flat box via UPS Ground. Unfortunately I cannot ship stretched canvases to any other countries.

Allow 10-12 days for canvas to ship.

name: The Poster Hanger. 20.5 inch
description:
This sturdy Poster Hanger is perfect for my large 20.5 inch bus scrolls sold in the Transit Design shop. Constructed of lightweight black anodized aluminum, the Poster Hanger is easily attached to your artwork – instructions included. 

You canvas will hang flat against the wall in an elegant, no fuss fashion.

Be sure to include one when ordering the  20.5” x 60” Transit Design Bus Scroll.
